author: S C H E M E R
text:
I predicted a 3 goal thrashing but we could have had more were it not for Bruno's back passes and selfishness.
Also Fred as a non-starter #MUNBRE

author: S C H E M E R
text: Fernandes is a spent force, pisses me off nowadays #MUNBRE

author: S C H E M E R
text:
1. Dalot needs to be out 2nd half.
2. Back passes will cost the team.
3. We need more attacking and Bruno needs to keep the flow moving.
4. Matic is too underrated.
MUNBRE

author: S C H E M E R
text: Dalot does not deserve play anymore. Bruno should be progressive, waiting for free freekicks wont win us the game. #MUNBRE

author: S C H E M E R
text: Why does Bruno keep killing attacks with his back passing? Will @ManUtd really score with these moves? #MUNBRE

author: S C H E M E R
text: These @ManUtd back passes will come to haunt us. Why not just attack? Forward movement? #MUNBRE

author: S C H E M E R
text: #MUNBRE thank goodness, no Fred around to start. We thrash Brentford 3 goals.

author: S C H E M E R
S C H E M E R
text: There is something that hapens yo players when they get 8nto @ManUtd, they become lazy, sluggish. Cases in point, Fernandes, Lukaku, Pogba, Sanchez #MUNCHE

author: S C H E M E R
text: Dalot, Rashford and Fernandes should be out in the 2nd half. Bruno is too slow, Rashford non-existent, Dalot is a drag. @ManUtd have to work on ball control, player marking  #MUNCHE

author: S C H E M E R
text: These fancy Bruno footworks will cost us dearly, Fernandes nowadays has poor ball control and passing #MUNCHE

author: S C H E M E R
S C H E M E R
text:
Been checking on Mr. Lambistic shit Kibe. Makes my nights and days. Guy is on point, mostly on girls conniving and weak men.
I might turn Kibetian when he finally says religion is a scam altogether. He still has some ground to cover on quoting the bible. 
Guy's real.

author: S C H E M E R
text: Bruno is a spent force 8n @ManUtd, he is becoming a weak point #ARSMUN

author: S C H E M E R
text: Tukubaliane waKenya, you deserve most of the leaders you have. In essence, you deserve the pain you are going through. Atleast most of you.

author: S C H E M E R
